sentences.en: A seahorse can eat up to 3000 brine fish a single day.
sentences.cn: 海马一天可以吃下高达三千只咸水鱼.

sentences.en: An analysis of antimicrobial susceptibility and isolation of pathogenic vibrio in brine.
sentences.cn: 海水;弧菌;抗菌药物;药敏试验.

sentences.en: As the saying goes, " brine point of tofu, a thinga thing. "
sentences.cn: 俗话说得好, “ 卤水点豆腐, 一物降一物 ”.

sentences.en: Electrical resistivity is used widely as a measure of brine saturation in rocks.
sentences.cn: 电阻率被广泛地用于测量岩石中的矿化水饱和度.

sentences.en: Hollow in the morning drink weak brine after all good?
sentences.cn: 早上空腹喝淡盐水到底好不好?

sentences.en: It advances output and concentration of brine and acquires the economic effect.
sentences.cn: 经过两年的生产实践,提高了卤水的产量和卤水浓度,取得了较大的经济效益.

sentences.en: It is then placed in metal containers and covered with brine.
sentences.cn: 金属容器先在14-18℃下放置3周,随后在低于6℃环境下放置,让奶酪继续成熟发酵.

sentences.en: Salt bridging in a brine tank can slowly reduce a systems capacity.
sentences.cn: 盐箱中的盐桥现象能够慢慢的减少系统地交换容量.

sentences.en: She steeped the cucumbers in brine.
Soak the walnuts in brine for four or five days.
sentences.cn: 把核桃放在盐水里泡四五天。

sentences.en: Some pickles are kept in brine.
sentences.cn: 有些腌菜是泡在盐水里的.

sentences.en: The meat marinated in the brine for two days.
sentences.cn: 这块肉在盐水里泡了两天.

sentences.en: Tibetan women carrying brine to the old salt field along Lancang River.
sentences.cn: 在昌都地区澜沧江边往盐田背盐水的妇女.

sentences.en: To preserve or flavor ( food ) in a solution of brine or vinegar.
sentences.cn: 腌制在卤水或醋溶液中保存或腌制 ( 食物 )

sentences.en: We shadow the sea with our sails , and reelingly cleeve the brine.
sentences.cn: 将帆影撒在海面上, 摇摇摆摆地劈开海水.

trans.tran_en: water that contains a lot of salt and is used for preserving food
